document.heading: Heat Wave Safety Amendment Act of 2015

history.narrative: Law 21-82, the “Heat Wave Safety Amendment Act of 2015” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 21-241. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on Dec. 1, 2015, and Dec. 15, 2015, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on Jan. 12, 2016, it was assigned Act No. 21-264 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 21-82 became effective March 9, 2016.
